config.script:
system.perspective.openPopup('Image', 'Exchange/MarkdownPlus/Popups/Image', {
			'domID': self.view.params.domID,
			'attachmentsTable': self.view.params.attachmentsTable,
			'fileSizeLimit': self.view.params.attachmentsFileSizeLimit
		},
		'Insert Image/Video',
		position = {
			'width' : '40%',
			'height': '90%'
		},
		draggable = True,
		resizable = True,
		showCloseIcon = True,
		modal = True,
		overlayDismiss = True)

system.perspective.openPopup('Image', 'Exchange/MarkdownPlus/Popups/Image', {
			'domID': self.view.params.domID,
			'type': 'video',
			'attachmentsTable': self.view.params.attachmentsTable,
			'fileSizeLimit': self.view.params.attachmentsFileSizeLimit
		},
		'Insert Video',
		position = {
			'width' : '40%',
			'height': '90%'
		},
		draggable = True,
		resizable = True,
		showCloseIcon = True,
		modal = True,
		overlayDismiss = True)

system.perspective.openPopup('File', 'Exchange/MarkdownPlus/Popups/File', {
			'domID': self.view.params.domID,
			'attachmentsTable': self.view.params.attachmentsTable,
			'fileSizeLimit': self.view.params.attachmentsFileSizeLimit
		},
		'Attach File',
		position = {
			'width' : '30%',
			'height': '24%'
		},
		draggable = True,
		resizable = True,
		showCloseIcon = True,
		modal = True,
		overlayDismiss = True)

config.expression:
'To create a header:

	# Header 1
	## Header 2
	### Header 3

' +
'To create a bulleted list:

	- Item 1
	- Item 2

' +
'Right click to:

	 Insert a special character at the cursor
	 Add formatting to selected text

' + 
if({view.params.userMentions} != 'None',
	'To mention a user, type '@' followed by their name.

',
	''
) + 
'Chrome users, hold down SHIFT or CTRL while
right-clicking to enable spell check menu'

config.script:
self.custom.shiftOrCtrlIsDown = False
	self.props.rejectUpdatesWhileFocused = self.view.params.rejectUpdatesWhileFocused
	self.custom.hasFocus = True
	self.custom.firstEnterTyped = False

import time

	self.props.rejectUpdatesWhileFocused = False
	time.sleep(0.5)
	if self.view.params.focusOnStartup and self.view.custom.runJS:
		self.focus()
		self.view.custom.selectionStart = len(self.view.params.text)
		self.view.custom.selectionEnd = len(self.view.params.text)
	self.props.rejectUpdatesWhileFocused = self.view.params.rejectUpdatesWhileFocused

customMethods.name: restoreUpdatesSettings
customMethods.script:
import time

	time.sleep(0.2)
	
	self.props.rejectUpdatesWhileFocused = self.view.params.rejectUpdatesWhileFocused
	
	time.sleep(0.2)
	
	self.view.custom.deferUpdates = self.view.params.deferUpdates

messageHandlers.script:
if payload['domID'] == self.view.custom.domID:
		self.view.custom.undoText = self.view.params.text
		self.props.rejectUpdatesWhileFocused = False
		index = self.view.custom.selectionStart
		text = self.props.text
		self.props.text = text[0:index] + payload['char'] + text[index:]
		self.view.custom.setCursorAt = index + 1
		self.restoreUpdatesSettings()

import time
		
	if payload['domID'] == self.view.custom.domID:
		self.props.rejectUpdatesWhileFocused = False
		
		time.sleep(0.1)
		
		self.view.custom.undoText = self.view.params.text
		index1 = self.view.custom.selectionStart
		index2 = self.view.custom.selectionEnd
		text = self.props.text
		if self.view.params.enableHTML:
			insertText = ':' + payload['description'].lower().replace(' ', '_') + ':'
		else:
			insertText = '&#' + payload['number'] + ';'
		self.props.text = text[0:index1] + insertText + text[index2:]
		self.view.custom.setCursorAt = index1 + len(insertText)
		
		time.sleep(0.5)
		
		self.focus()
		self.restoreUpdatesSettings()

import time
	import re

	def insertMention(userName, cursorAt):
		textUpToCursor = self.props.text[:cursorAt]
		textAfterCursor = self.props.text[cursorAt:]
		adj = len(re.sub('^[\s\S]*\@(\w+)$', '\\1', textUpToCursor))
		self.props.text = re.sub('^([\s\S]*)\@\w+$', '\\1@' + userName, textUpToCursor) + textAfterCursor
		self.view.custom.setCursorAt = cursorAt + len(userName) - adj
		
		time.sleep(0.2)
		
		self.focus()
		self.view.custom.mentioning = ''
		self.props.rejectUpdatesWhileFocused = self.view.params.rejectUpdatesWhileFocused
		self.view.custom.deferUpdates = self.view.params.deferUpdates
		self.view.custom.mentionSelectedIndex = 0
		
	if payload['domID'] == self.view.custom.domID:
		self.props.rejectUpdatesWhileFocused = False
		self.view.custom.deferUpdates = False
		
		time.sleep(0.1)
		
		insertMention(payload['user'].replace(' ', '_'), self.view.custom.selectionEnd)

import time

	if payload['domID'] == self.view.custom.domID:
		time.sleep(0.2)
		self.focus()

if payload['domID'] == self.view.custom.domID:
		self.props.rejectUpdatesWhileFocused = False
		index = self.view.custom.selectionStart
		text = self.props.text
		try:
			iconType = exchange.markdownPlus.attachments.getFileAttachmentIcon(payload['name'])
			insert = '<[file?id=' + str(payload['id']) + '&type=' + payload['type'] + '&name=' + payload['name'].replace(']', '~CB~') + ' type=' + iconType + ']>\n'
			self.props.text = text[0:index] + insert + text[index:]
			self.view.custom.setCursorAt = index + len(insert)
			self.restoreUpdatesSettings()
		except Exception as e:
			system.perspective.print(str(e))

insertTable
